// author: AhmedTai

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <fstream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <set>
#include <bitset>
#include <climits>
#include <map>
#include <list>
#include <deque>

using namespace std;

#define reps(i,s,n) for(int i=s;i<n;i++)
#define rep(i,n) reps(i,0,n)
#define rreps(i,s,n) for(int i=n-1;i>=s;i--)
#define rrep(i,n) rreps(i,0,n)
#define pb push_back

int main(){
	vector<int> primes;
	bitset<1001> bs;
	// Sieve
	bs.reset();
	bs.flip();
	reps(i, 2, 100){
		if(bs.test(i)){
			for(int j=i*i;j<1001; j+=i)
				bs.set(j, 0);
		}
	}
	reps(i, 28, 1000) {	if(bs.test(i)) primes.pb(i); }

	// Prob
	int T, N;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--){
		scanf("%d",&N);
		long ans = 0;
		int pos=0;
		while(pos<primes.size() && primes[pos]<=N) ans += primes[pos++];
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
